loc.EN:
The 5.56Ã—30mm MINSAS is a firearm cartridge manufactured by the Ordnance Factory Board (OFB) for close-quarters combat use. It has an effective range of 300 metres (980 ft) and good penetration against body armor. OFB claims that its penetration rate is better than 9mm caliber. It is currently chambered in the Modern Sub Machine Carbine and Amogh carbine.
(https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/5.56%C3%9730mm_MINSAS)
